      • fromString

        public static CompilerMessage fromString(java.lang.String string)
        Creates a CompilerMessage from a string. This format is used: [{file}:{line}:(error | warning | info):]message
        Parameters:
        string -
        Returns:
        the generated CompilerMessage, or null if this failed.

      • messageTypeFromString

        public static CompilerMessageType messageTypeFromString(java.lang.String s)
        Parameters:
        s -
        Returns:
